title: Auth0 Logs to LogDNA
name: auth0-logs-to-logdna
description: This extension will take all of your Auth0 logs and export them to LogDNA

LOGDNA_HOSTNAME.description: Hostname for log shipper. Defaults to 'auth0-logs'.

LOGDNA_APPLICATION_NAME.description: Application name for log shipper. Defaults to 'auth0'.
